SAINT.Name: Friday of the Sixth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the ?th Tone

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Because of the house of the Lord our God,
I have sought good things for thee.
SEXTE.STICHOS: I was glad because of them that said unto me: Let us go into the house of the Lord.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Have mercy on us, O Lord
SEXTE.STICHOS: Unto Thee have I lifted up mine eyes, unto Thee that dwellest in heaven.
